official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to fishing licenses for senior citizens.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that any individual aged 65 or older should be permitted to fish in any State without purchasing a license.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to fishing licenses for senior citizens.
